TopicTitle: Any tricks to getting things mounted in the middle of girder segments?

Articles.Content: I'm trying to get a piece to attach to the middle of a strut and no matter what I do the strut goes the wrong way and always wants to attach to an end. Any tricks? I even put a clamp-o-tron in the middle of the strut but it made no difference.
Oh it gets worse, I mounted the girder sideways, got my can attached, then tried to spin it back around and re-attach the can but now nothing will even stick to the bottom of the can!?!?
Pics might help if you can provide 'em!
